message: so sad this show got canceled
(Which is a sure sign it was a great show, I always miss the best ones when they're on the air)

SUCH a good show.  Just awesome enough to get cancelled.
It's on netflix instant watch though which is great.
is this the show with Jane Lynch? prior to Glee?
Yeah.  She was replaced in season 2 by Megan Mullally after she switched to glee.

also starred Ken Marino, from MTV's The State, and Veronica Mars
in fact, there were all kinds of Veronica Mars connections, since they were both created by the same guy, Rob Thomas (not the guy from Matchbox 20)
